Desc: Relating to immunizations; authorizing joint rules regulating the administration of immunizations
Relating to requiring influenza immunizations for health care workers
Relating to prohibiting employers from requiring any employee to have or receive an influenza immunization
Relating to offering influenza immunizations to patients upon discharge from licensed hospitals
Relating to authorizing the Board of Pharmacy to create a legislative rule to permit a pharmacist or pharmacy intern to administer certain immunizations
